unnormalised: Probability mhaje taleacherlean vaita, bhai! Especially statistics. Mhunnleear, kitli shakya asa ki hanv Bayes' theorem vastavik jivitachi bhagidari kortolo? 0.0001% astolem? Aaz kal toh soglle AI/ML kortat, ani tancheantui hem soglle ankdeanchi khell asa. Mhojea ixttan Rohan-an CAT porjek statistics vaprun 99 percentile meloile. Samajhona, kiteak ami standard deviation daddun kadcheak zai jea vellar ami fakt Excel vaprunk zata.
normalised: Probability mhaje mathyeacherlean votala, bhai! Especially statistics. Mhantlear, Bayes' theorem vastavik jivitantle vaprunk mellche kitle chance asat? zero point zero zero zero one percent asunk xakta? Aaz kal to soglle A-I slash M-L kortat, ani tanneant legit numbersacho khel asa. Mhozo ixtt Rohan-ak C-A-T exam-ant ninety nine percentile mell'lle statistics vaprun. Samajhona, ami standard deviation kiteak calculate korunk zai jemn ami fakt Excel vaprunk xaktat.
text: Probability mhaka mathea voirlean vota, bhau! Especially statistics. Mhanje, Bayes' theorem mhaka khoreponnan jivitak vapronk mellteleacho chance kitle asa? 0.0001% asa astolo? Aaz kal toh soglle AI/ML kortat, ani tanyeo poryan numbersacho khel asta. Mhozo ixtt Rohan-an CAT examan statistics vaprun 99 percentile zoddle. Samajhona, jea vellar apunn Excel vaprunk zata, tea vellar standard deviation kitleak kaddche poddta.
